channel.title: Scarborough Campus on Ontario Universities & Colleges Coalition
channel.description: Recent content in Scarborough Campus on Ontario Universities & Colleges Coalition

item.title: UofT Scarborough Coalition Meeting - March 4
item.description: Date: Monday, March 4 Time: 5:30 pm to 8:00 pm (dinner starts at 5:30 pm, meeting starts at 6:10 pm) Location: 1265 Military Trail, Student Centre, TV Lounge Click here to RSVP We would like to invite you to attend our planning meeting for the We are the Students campaign. You may have heard that earlier this year the Ford government announced sweeping changes to post-secondary education. Our movement, built by students, workers, and community members are concerned with the changes made to OSAP, funding for post-seconday education, and the attacks on student organizing.
